segment.source: How to Deny Access to an Application
segment.target: How to Deny Access to an Application

segment.source: How to Deny Access to an Application
segment.target: How to Deny Access to an Application

segment.source: How to Deny Access to an Application
segment.target: How to Deny Access to an Application

segment.source: Users must be in an application's Access Permissions list to load and use the application.
segment.target: Users must be in an application's Access Permissions list to load and use the application.

segment.source: Although the Application Virtualization Server Management Console does not support explicitly denying a user group access to an application, you can remove the user groups from an application’s properties to achieve this.
segment.target: Although the Application Virtualization Server Management Console does not support explicitly denying a user group access to an application, you can remove the user groups from an application’s properties to achieve this.

segment.source: To deny access to an application
segment.target: To deny access to an application

segment.source: For an existing application, click the Applications node in the left pane.
segment.target: For an existing application, click the Applications node in the left pane.

segment.source: Right-click an application in the right pane, and choose Properties.
segment.target: Right-click an application in the right pane, and choose Properties.

segment.source: Then select the Access Permissions tab.
segment.target: Then select the Access Permissions tab.

segment.source: To remove access for a user group, highlight the user group and click Remove.
segment.target: To remove access for a user group, highlight the user group and click Remove.

segment.source: To control access to applications, you can also limit the application licenses.
segment.target: To control access to applications, you can also limit the application licenses.

segment.source: Setting up the proper user groups in Active Directory Domain Services provides the easiest way to grant and deny access to specific sets of users.
segment.target: Setting up the proper user groups in Active Directory Domain Services provides the easiest way to grant and deny access to specific sets of users.

segment.source: How to Grant Access to an Application
segment.target: How to Grant Access to an Application
